sentences.sentence: As countless boards and business owners will attest, constraining firms from firing poorly performing, high-earning managers is a handbrake on boosting productivity and overall performance.
sentences.translation: 无数的董事会和企业主将会验证，限制企业解雇绩效不佳的高薪经理，就是在给提高生产效率和整体业绩拉下手刹。

sentences.sentence: Specify a constraining rule between attributes and elements.
sentences.translation: 在属性和元素之间指定一个约束规则。

sentences.sentence: You can even define your own custom constraining mechanisms.
sentences.translation: 甚至可以定义自己的约束机制。
